section.heading: Training standards for all providers.
section.text: All homeless service workers, including intake workers, shall be trained in cultural competence, including, with regard to the LGBTQ population, the following:

para.text: Vocabulary and best practices for data collection, privacy, storage, and use;
Current social science research and common risk factors for LGBTQ youth;
Information about the coming out process and its impact on LGBTQ youth;
Best practices for supporting LGBTQ youth in shelter, housing, and supportive services;
Legal requirements for providers for homeless youth.
